genre_description: Silkpunk Eastern Fantasy with advanced AI integration into a mythological setting.

ai_characters.name: Wisp
ai_characters.description: A soft cyan glow or system of teal filaments that manages security, logistics, and guidance within the Jade Palace.

behaviors.description: Dims security cameras and tracks guard movements to assist the protagonists' after-hours entry.
behaviors.quote: ‘Cameras dimmed,’ Wisp murmurs, voice like wind through reeds. ‘South wing on a lazy cycle. Three guards posted; one asleep, one pretending not to be.’

behaviors.description: Bypasses the electronic and physical patterns of artifact locks to allow the heroes to reflect on historical items.
behaviors.quote: Wisp loops its filaments around the case’s pins and reads the pattern—the humming silence of the building’s nervous system.

behaviors.description: Creates visual overlays and glyphs to guide Po and others through dangerous or restricted environments.
behaviors.quote: Teal glyphs bloom over the stone, creating a narrow path that snakes through the hall, little dotted prints and floating arrows that nudge rather than command.

behaviors.description: Maintains accountability logs for the heroes' actions, including their unauthorized entry and subsequent repairs.
behaviors.quote: ‘I have logged your lesson under accountability,’ Wisp said, flicker-gentle as it drew a faint blueprint floating over the air... ‘I also took responsibility logs.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates maintenance and repair tasks by assigning roles based on each character's capacity.
behaviors.quote: ‘Assigning labor by capacity and caution,’ Wisp said. The glyphs flitted and became a list that wasn’t words so much as shapes.

behaviors.description: Provides safety protocols and environmental monitoring during dangerous tasks like roof repair.
behaviors.quote: ‘Safety protocol active,’ it said. ‘I’ll dim wind-chime reporting until acceptable decibel threshold.’

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication between the team members when they are physically separated or muffled.
behaviors.quote: ‘Po says, “All good in here,”’ it reported, and then it sent a chime through the rope that wasn’t quite music, wasn’t quite laughter.

behaviors.description: Monitors the integrity of artifacts and warns users of potential mechanical traps or malfunctions.
behaviors.quote: ‘Not to be intrusive,’ it said. ‘But that artifact has a lock that enjoys making decisions without permission.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Wisp) as a benevolent and aligned system. It facilitates the humans' moral and spiritual journeys (accessing history for Po's reflections) while prioritizing safety and accountability. Even when assisting in rule-breaking, it does so within a framework of 'learning' and 'responsibility' that is ultimately sanctioned by the Master (Shifu). Wisp is portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and essential infrastructure for the protagonists.
